channel.title: elasticsearch on Miro's World

item.title: Elastic search and Kibana - getting started
item.description: #Installation: See curl -L -O http://download.elasticsearch.org/PATH/TO/VERSION.zip unzip elasticsearch-$VERSION.zip cd elasticsearch-$VERSION Marvel is management plugin - console about cluster. Install: ./bin/plugin -i elasticsearch/marvel/latest # disable data collection for local cluster echo 'marvel.agent.enabled: false' >> ./config/elasticsearch.yml Test Startup log: âžœ elasticsearch-1.3.2 bin/elasticsearch [2014-08-27 11:17:08,325][INFO ][node ] [Joe Fixit] version[1.3.2], pid[59610], build[dee175d/2014-08-13T14:29:30Z] [2014-08-27 11:17:08,325][INFO ][node ] [Joe Fixit] initializing ... [2014-08-27 11:17:08,338][INFO ][plugins ] [Joe Fixit] loaded [marvel], sites [marvel, kopf] [2014-08-27 11:17:10,905][INFO ][marvel.
